meanings.definition: A herbicide used to control broadleaf weeds
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed piclorams on their fields to kill unwanted plants.
meanings.sent2: The gardeners applied piclorams to get rid of the pesky dandelions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits thought the piclorams were a new type of salad dressing!
meanings.sent4: The piclorams acted like a silent assassin, targeting only the broadleaf weeds.
meanings.sent5: The smell of piclorams lingered in the air, a sign of a weed-free garden.

meanings.sent1: The store had both piclorams and other herbicides on sale.
meanings.sent2: She bought two bottles of piclorams for her garden.
meanings.sent3: The piclorams on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: In the field, the piclorams stood together, ready to fight the weeds.
meanings.sent5: The piclorams in the container sparkled under the sunlight, a sight to behold.
